text:
@realDonaldTrump Can anyone believe with #COVID19 infections out of control and Russian bounties on American soldiers that #BenedictDonald wants to triple down on his racism? Incredible stupidity!

How soon can he be arrested for #TRE45ON? 

#TrumpIsARacist 
#TrumpTraitor 
#TrumpResign
#LockHimUp https://t.co/ZN7PiDtrzv
